title: ledu_ico
author: ledu_ico
content: Education Ecosystem world keeps on growing bigger and bigger.Education Ecosystem is going to be among one of the biggest crypto platform to sponsor the Blockchain Economy Summit events in Istanbul, Türkiye 27-28 July 2022.We will be there live, will you be there ?We will be among one of the biggest #crypto platform to sponsor the Blockchain Economy Summit events in #Istanbul,Türkiye 27-28 July 2022.
